籤詩版本二:
A gabas, akwai kyakkyawan Chanjuan a cikin hasken wata, kuma gajimare sun rufe shi na ɗan lokaci kuma suna ɓoye.
Wani lokaci yana iya zama zagaye, amma wani lokacin yana iya ɓacewa, masu cewa ba haka ba ne kawai maganganun banza.
詩意:
Wata a cikin wannan hexagram yana rufe da gajimare.
Komai yana cikin suma.
解曰: Gizagizai masu iyo sun rufe wata. Babu bukatar shakka. Jiran gajimare ya tattara. Sannan zaku gane.
籤詩故事一:
◇Bao Gong yana neman Empress Li
A zamanin Zhenzong na daular Song, Empress Li (Empress Li) ta kasance kuyanga a cikin harami, Song Zhenzong ya ba ta tagomashi, aka kara mata girma zuwa Wanyi, har ta samu ciki.
Amma a lokacin, ƙwarƙwarar Liu Def (daga baya Sarauniya Liu) ta yi mugun tunani kuma ta ba wa eunub Guo Huai cin hanci don ya maye gurbin ɗan sarki Li da wata katuwar fata, ta kwace ɗanta ta gaya wa sarki cewa shi ɗanta ne. Song Zhenzong ya fusata kuma ya aika Li Empress zuwa fadar mai sanyi.
Bayan da Concubine De ta zama sarauniya, ta yi shirin kashe Empress Li, wadda ta tsere daga fada.
Wata rana, Li Niangniang, da ke zaune a kan titi, ta sadu da Bao Zheng, wakilin daular da ke sintiri a yankin, ta ba shi labarin irin abubuwan da ta faru a rayuwa, kuma ita ce mahaifiyar sarki Song Renzong na yanzu. . Bayan da Bao Zheng ya samu labarin lamarin, ya kai Li Niangniang zuwa birnin Beijing, ya kai rahoto ga Song Renzong, ya kuma gano lamarin, a karshe uwa da dansa sun gane juna. Empress Dowager Liu da eunuch Guo Huai sun sunkuyar da kawunansu suka yi ikirari.
聖意: Ba ni da dadi a gida, ina addu'a don kariya ta kudi, matsalolin kudi, sa'a a kasuwanci, aure, bala'i, mutane a filin, tsutsotsi, dabbobin da ba su da kyau, wahalar samun mutane, kara, asara, hijira, ra'ayin mazan jiya, asarar dukiya. Cututtukan yammacin duniya, masu wahalar warkewa, gyaran kabari na dutse
古人: Bao Gong yana neman Empress Li
第X籤: Wanda ya lashe caca na ashirin da takwas
